source_objects.title: Sales
source_objects.description: Improve your sales skills with courses on sales promotion, mastering sales calls, mastering sales meetings, sales persuasion skills, cold calling skills, closing sales and more.

items.title: Cold Call 101: How to Cold Call like a Boss
items.headline: Learn the secret cold calling techniques and systems for getting anyone on the phone and getting new business, today!
objectives_summary: You will achieve courage to overcome your fear of picking up the phone

Feel comfortable "selling" without sounding or feeling "salesy"

items.title: Sales and Relationship Management in Financial Services
items.headline: Learn the proper methods of conducting sales and performing relationship management in banking and financial services.
objectives_summary: You'll learn the key principles of sales and relationship management
You'll learn how to optimize your sales strategy
You'll learn how to perform excellent relationship management with clients

items.title: Learn Cold calling like the Wolf of Wall Street in 3 days
items.headline: Cold calling like Jordan Belfort: learn how to cold call, handle objections & close the sale with this 3 day challenge
objectives_summary: Confidently making any cold call
Professionally handling objections
Remembering the biggest mistakes and how not to fall into those traps

items.title: Excel 101: Create Your Own CRM In Excel Masterclass
items.headline: 2021 Update: Includes Template! Design, Build and Utilize Your OWN Custom CRM System In Excel Masterclass
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
Template Download: Template Built In The Course Is Available For Download At Course End
Microsoft Excel

items.title: Strategies for Finding New Web Design & SEO Clients in 2021
items.headline: Create your unique marketing plan as we cover the exact lead generation strategies you can use to find new clients
objectives_summary: Take action and begin implementing several lead generation strategies
Find the best strategies for finding targeted clients
Understand how to determine who you serve so you can target your marketing and find clients easier

items.title: Killer Sales Technique, Learn Conversational Selling
items.headline: This is your course to become A top sales person in your company or for yourself.
objectives_summary: Sell your idea, prodect or service with confidence and have fun doing it.
Learn what "Conversational Selling " really means and why using it will  close more deals with half the effort of traditional selling methods
Understand how to change your mindset from "preasure to close " to "Enjoy the conversation"

Make Cold Calls To Agents That Make Them Want To Meet You
